Translations.Text: ahashi æti dæ ha mahapolovehi æti dæ allahta suvisuddha karayi. (ohu) rajuya. parisuddhaya. sarva baladhariya. maha pragnavantaya

ohu vanahi livimata ho kiyavimata nohæki aya atarata ohuge vadan ovunata parayanaya kara penvana, tavada ovun pivituru karana, emenma deva granthaya ha pragnava uganvana daham dutayaku eviya. mita pera ovuhu pæhædili mulavaka sitiyo ya
tavada ovun samaga metek ekatu novu, ovun atara siti pasugamin atarata da (eviya.) tavada ohu sarva baladhariya. maha pragnavantaya
eya allahge (amatara) bhagyayaki. ohu abhimata karana ayata eya pirinamayi. tavada allah atimahat vu bhagyaya sampannaya

tavrataya usulannata salasvanu læba, pasu va eya noisilu ayata upamava pot podiyak usulana buruvage upamava væniya. allahge vadan boru kala janayage upama va napuruya. tavada allah aparadhakari janayata maga nopenvayi

“aho yudevvuvani! sesu janayata vada niyata vasayenma numbala allahge sumituran yæyi taraye visvasa kalehu nam esema numbala satyavadin lesa sitiyehu nam numbala maranayata asa karanu” yæyi numba pavasanu
ovunge at idiripat kala dæ hetuven ovuhu eya (maranaya) kisiviteka asa nokarati. tavada allah aparadhakaruvan pilibanda va sarva gnaniya

“niyata vasayenma numbala eyin pala yana maranaya vanahi sæbævinma eya numbala va hamuvanu æta. pasu va gupta dæ ha drsyamana dæ pilibanda sarvagnayanan veta numbala nævata yomu karanu labannehuya. evita numbala sidu karamin siti dæ pilibanda va ohu numbalata danvanu æta

aho visvasa kalavuni! jumua dina salataya sandaha ærayum karanu læbu vita allah menehi kirima sandaha yuhusulu va yanu. tavada vyaparaya numbala ata hæra damanu. numbala dæna sitiyehu nam eya numbalata yahapatya
salataya itu kirima avasan karanu læbu vita numbala mahapolove visira gos allahge bhagyaya soyanu. tavada numbala jaya læbiya hæki vanu pinisa allah va adhika lesa menehi karanu

ehet, ovuhu yam velandamak ho yam vinodayak dutu vita, (kutba desana karana) numba va sitagat tattvayema ata hæra dama e veta ovuhu yati. allah abiyasa æti dæ vinodayata ha velandamata vada sresthaya. tavada allah posakayingen vadat sresthaya
